participant.name: LWO
participant.description: LWO (Light Well Organization) was established in 2008. It specializes in the development, implementation and maintenance of software for financial organizations and large corporate clients. The company is a major developer of software for Belarusian banks, enterprises and government agencies. More than 400 fulltime employees and 200 completed projects. The activities of the company include development of integrated automation systems for the banking sector (retail and corporate business, building prudential, management and analytical reporting, risk management), systems of remote banking services (Internet banking, mobile banking, vip-banking), mobile applications development for banks, solutions for leasing companies (automation of preparation processes, accounting, control of execution), IT solutions for business organizations (information portals, electronic documents archive), information security.

participant.name: Healthy Networks
participant.description:
Established in 2017, Healthy Networks with a team of data scientists, business developers and medical professionals has developed a unique technology for recognizing lung sounds. The project “LungPass” is the world’s first low-cost AI-powered stethoscope for early detection and at-home self-management of respiratory conditions.
The project was developed in close cooperation with the Department of Pulmonology and Phthisiology of the Belarusian Medical Academy of Postgraduate Education. Healthy Networks is working on registering “LungPass” as medical devices in Belarus and the European Union.

participant.name: R-Nox
participant.solution: Hardware and Software platform solution for city monitoring of air quality
participant.description: Hardware and Software platform solution for city monitoring of air quality

participant.name: Total Games
participant.solution: Project Goodville, game for depression diagnosis and treatment
participant.description:
The company has more than 15 years of experience in game development. Total Games team has skills and experience with 3D cinematics, AI technologies mobile games marketing, big-data management and statistic/analysis systems.

About 40 products released with the total audience of all projects s more than 210 mln people and the total revenue of all projects is more than $110 mln.

The project “Goodville” is a clinically tested app to prevent and fight depressive disorders. We combine the gaming industry expertise with the scientific approach to address mental health issues from a completely new angle.

participant.name: Solar LS
participant.solution: Laser technologies and equipment, new startups with laser technologies
participant.description:
SOLAR LS has been successfully working in the international photonics market for more than 25
years and is an expert in research, development and manufacturing of solid-state laser systems and
instruments for spectral analysis for scientific, medical and industrial applications. We offer reliable
technologically advanced solutions that help our customers to answer the tasks they face.

participant.name: Izovac
participant.solution: Technologies of optical coatings, startups of AR glasses and solid state film batteries
participant.description: IZOVAC is engaged in development and optimization of optical coatings, next-generation coating deposition technologies, manufacture of vacuum sputtering systems for optics, microelectronics, displays and photovoltaics.

participant.name: Promwad
participant.description:
Established in 2004, the company designs new devices and software for the growing markets: telecommunications, consumer devices & IoT, automotive electronics, home and industrial automation, media and entertainment.
Promwad Soft was founded on the basis of the Promwad electronics design center with extensive experience in implementing sophisticated high-tech developments and partnership programs with global manufacturers of electronic components. The development center is located in Minsk and employs 100 people.
The company offers two projects for raising capital:
neuronavigator, optical navigation system designed for accurate and safe operations on the brain and spine, inexpensive and easy to use. The working prototype consists of a computer, software, a stereo camera and a set of devices with built-in sensors.
training simulator for neurosurgeons that can help to train and certify medical staff combining technology navigation station and VR. The project is aimed at bringing the training process as close as possible to the actual conditions of the operation.

participant.name: VR Development
participant.solution: Projects in VR for hotels and education
participant.description:
VR Development was established in 2019 by the shareholders of the largest VR-entertainment park in Europe – Teleport.
VIAVR is service by a Belarus-based provider of in-house proprietary fully-fledged B2B2C solution for the hospitality industry offering a new experience to the hotel guests through viewing VR content in a special VR helmet right in the hotel room.
The company also offers specially developed VR lessons for schools.viavr.global

participant.name: LifeHelp
participant.description:
The company offers an online solution for psychological and psychotherapeutical services, the marketplace that will allow to choose from thousands of psychotherapists according to different criteria.
lifehelp.co

participant.name: Rozum Robotics
participant.solution: Synchronous alternating-current frameless actuators featuring superior torque density
participant.description:
Established in 2015, Rozum Robotics is an R&D and manufacturing company with representative offices in the USA, Russia, and Belarus. The company specializes in innovative robotics and high-precision motor technology. Its product range includes collaborative robotic arms for industrial and commercial use, high-torque compact servos, and frameless motors. 
Rozum Robotics runs the entire manufacturing cycle - from in-house research and development to designing components and assembling them into plug-and-use solutions. 
The only company in Belarus and CIS working in this segment.

participant.name: Insailing
participant.solution: Choose and book sailing events easily
participant.description: iNsailing is a web platform that connects skippers, professional sailors, yacht owners with other sailors, athletes, and people who would like to participate in different sailing events. The platform allows you to search for places for the specific regatta easy and connect directly with the skipper.

participant.name: Rocketbody
participant.description:
The company was established in 2018. It presents an application in the field of medicine and sports to increase the performance of athletes and a platform for sports teams and coaches.
The activities of the company also include development of a series of smart watches for athletes and people leading an active lifestyle, ECG holters to identify cardiac pathologies and studies of physical health.

participant.name: Feeling digital
participant.description:
Feeling Digital is a media studio that has been working with technology for film and art business for over 5 years. The company focuses on working with visual images, studies the following aspects: human interaction with the digital environment through a spatial computing interface, effectiveness of immersive advertising, perception of information through applications with experimental design, recreation of real physics in a project/application; expertise in working with the latest VR / AR / Digital devices.
The company's VR video entered the World TOP-10 of the best 360 videos. Feeling Digital is also the only company in Belarus to create an LBVR multiplayer for “from idea to implementation”.

participant.name: Vibrobox
participant.solution: Vibration diagnostics service for proactive maintenance
participant.description:
The company presents comprehensive solution for maintenance repair and operations market. Headquarters and R&D in Minsk, 20 people in team, core competences – digital signal processing, neural networks, ML/DL, and AI.
The project concentrates on automatic vibration-based diagnostics and prescriptive maintenance of rotary industrial equipment. VibroBox system has three main elements – industrial equipment, analytical platform and user interface.

participant.name: AIRCONN BEL TECHNOLOGY
participant.solution: The airconn IoT platform is a platform for collecting, storing and analyzing data from various IoT devices.
participant.description:
The company specializes in development of IoT software. The company concentrates on projects that use machine learning methods, artificial intelligence, big data and blockchain technology.
The main project is a platform for collecting and analyzing data for IoT solutions. The activity is focused on automation of resource consumption accounting: electricity, water, heat, gas.

participant.name: G Key Lab
participant.solution: VR/AR in Sales and Marketing Using cutting edge technologies such VR/AR/MR, our solutions deliver greater KPIs and reduce costs
participant.description:
The Parallel was created to develop solutions in B2B segment using VR technology. The head office is in London, R&D – in Minsk. The key competence – VR/AR/MR, e-learning, brain-computer interface, CRM integration, data analysis.
The company presents the project Cleverpoint, a neurodevice for capturing bio-data of users during VR-sessions.

participant.name: Wizart
participant.solution: Through advanced machine learning and computer vision technologies we developed a cutting-edge solution to meet the modern-day challenges of interior design industry
participant.description: Established in 2018. The company creates software for visualization of interiors using computer vision and augmented reality. The innovation of the project lies in the possibility of ""virtual fitting"" of various types of wall coverings (wallpaper, paint) in photographs of interiors. The application identifies and recognizes objects, the system deals with pre-loaded photos, and those obtained while working with the application in real time.
